climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 12 Double Rolls of Scott ComfortPlus Toilet Paper, 231 sheets per roll—packaging may vary from images shown.
3x stronger than the leading bargain brand, Scott ComfortPlus 1-ply toilet paper breaks down 6x faster* and is sewer-safe, septic-safe and clog-free.
1 Double Roll = 2 regular rolls, so you can change rolls less often.
Free of perfumes or scents, so no need to worry about allergies or irritation.
Scott bathroom tissue is sustainably sourced from responsibly managed forests, features recyclable packaging and is a 100% biodegradable tissue.
body.description: Discover comfort and clean you can trust with Scott ComfortPlus toilet tissue rolls: 1-layer toilet paper that offers everyday comfort plus reliable strength. With Scott ComfortPlus Toilet Paper, you get 12 Double Rolls of 231 sheets, so you have plenty of toilet paper for you and your loved ones. 3x stronger than the leading bargain brand, Scott ComfortPlus breaks down 6x faster vs the leading brand one ply and is sewer-safe, septic-safe and clog-free. And here’s one more reason why Scott ComfortPlus toilet paper is the perfect addition to your household supplies: Our 1-ply toilet tissue paper combines just the right amount of softness and strength by featuring thick and plush sheets for a trusted, comforting clean. We’ve been trusted for generations: Scott bathroom tissue is sustainably sourced from responsibly managed forests, features recyclable packaging and is a 100% biodegradable tissue. Keep life rolling by ordering Scott ComfortPlus in bulk online! * vs the leading brand one ply

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great toilet paper! Was cheaper than at Walmart. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have this toilet paper on auto ship. The quality is great as well as the price. It is more absorbent than most other brands, so you don’t have to use as much. It is great for more sensitive behinds, as it is soft and does not cause irritation. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This a strong tp! I like that it’s safe for my septic system, strong, yet breaks down easy, and has a good thickness to it. Great quality, great value, and it does what it’s supposed to do without breaking up as you use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t know about the quality of the tissue, it’s like the regular Scott which has a thinner quality rolls, the roll seems bulky but the quality of it is thicker, quantity is less. I don’t mean that this is cheap, it is still a good one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent budget tp
reviews.reviewText: I like this far and above compared to angel soft, it doesn't shredded and it's so much softer and thicker. It's no cottonelle or Charmin but it's the best budget paper I've found. I will say for a $6 pack of tp, charging $3(half the item price) to get it next day when I was getting other items delivered already anyways seems a bit steep but I guess we have to pay for convenience. Used to get nearly everything next day for free but anymore it seems they want to tack on a fee. I order a lot of household staples last min on Amazon and used to appreciate that I could get them next day because on a tight budget you don't tend to order more than you need in advance. I don't mind waiting a week for a tee shirt or book or whatever but waiting a week for tp in a house full of people is not ideal so I just paid the $3.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars don't fit in standard tp holder opening
reviews.reviewText: I am truly a prima donna when it comes to toilet paper. Charmin has been my preferred brand for as long as I can remember. A few times during the pandemic I did have to buy alternates, the ripples kind was awful, the other premium brands were okay, bamboo paper was very soft but not very absorbent. Always fantastic when Charmin was back in stock.That being said, the latest rounds of Charmin Ultra Soft are lower in quality. The paper does not feel as "ultra" soft, more like nicely soft, and it shreds so fast. They are making the rolls bigger and bigger, they barely fit in the holder, but having to use twice as much is annoying.Clearly Charmin Ultra Soft is still a superior product to most on the market, just not as prima donna pleasing as it once was. So, a 4 star instead of a 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: It's great for what it is. I would rather buy this toilet paper because it's not too expensive and it's not too thin. It's very good and will save you money with inflation prices rising it's better to be prepared and no need for expensive toilet paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'd say this Scott Tissue Paper (Comfort Plus) is very reliable in being both soft & comfortable. It's pretty thick and absorbs well which leads to having to use less tissue paper so it lasts awhile. I accidentally got Regular Scott Tissue earlier this month & there was a huge difference. It was only 1 ply where as this is 2 ply so be sure to not make that mistake. I could've got better tissue at the Dollar Store seriously. It almost ruined me from Scott for good bc I was not expecting that from a name brand tissue but then I saw that this one I usually get says comfort plus & it's a fantastic value for the low price. They are definitely keeping up with their competitors. I would recommend this specific type of Scott Tissue paper only. I would never get the regular " long lasting" one again!
